body: Do you make a discussion in the appeal an infraction section or what?
body_tagged: Do you make a discussion in the appeal an infraction section or what?
title: how do you appeal an infraction?

replies.body:
Make an appeal here https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=50
Read this https://avicus.net/forums/4f955d6ab before creating a ban-appeal.
